pages.text: The Hand of Death is the ultimate sentient weapon, forged from demon-infused steel through dark rituals. This legendary scythe combines all the power of the Runic Sentient Scythe with devastating additional effects that make it a true instrument of death.

Forged in the $(blood)Hellfire Forge$() using a $(item)Runed Sentient Scythe$(), $(item)Demon Slate$(), $(item)Dragon Breath$(), and a $(item)Rune of Culling$(). Requires $(will)2048 demon will minimum$() and consumes $(will)1024 will$().

$(animus)Ultimate Power$()$(br)+14 base damage over the Runic Scythe, plus all demon will bonuses and enhanced attack speed.$(br2)Requires Demon Forged Steel to craft; a material only obtainable through advanced Blood Magic rituals.

pages.title: Lifesteal
pages.text: $(blood)Vampiric Essence$()$(br2)Every strike with the Hand of Death drains the life force from your victim, healing you for 20% of the damage dealt (minimum 1 health).$(br2)Heart particles will appear around you as the weapon absorbs life energy, making you nearly unstoppable in extended combat.

pages.title: Execute
pages.text: $(animus)Death's Judgment$()$(br2)When an enemy falls below 15% of their maximum health, the Hand of Death's true power awakens. The next strike will instantly execute the target, dealing damage equal to their maximum health.$(br2)A spiral of soul particles and an ominous sound herald the reaping of another soul, as enemies are claimed by death itself.

pages.title: Combined Power
pages.text: The Hand of Death retains all features from the Runic Sentient Scythe:$(br2)• 30% faster attack speed$(br)• Full demon will damage scaling$(br)• Malum spirit harvesting (when installed)$(br2)Combined with lifesteal and execute mechanics, this makes it one of the most powerful weapons achievable through blood magic mastery.
